mapper.sql: ID, NAME, YEAR, TELEPHONE, AUDITORS, QUOTA, TOTAL_ASSETS, TOTAL_LIABILITIES, TOTAL_NET_ASSETS, TAKING, AUDIT_OPINION, LIABILITIES_LIST, PROFIT_LIST, CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT, CHANGE_LIST, SUPPLIER_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_FINANCE (ID, NAME, YEAR, TELEPHONE, AUDITORS, QUOTA, TOTAL_ASSETS, TOTAL_LIABILITIES, TOTAL_NET_ASSETS, TAKING, AUDIT_OPINION, LIABILITIES_LIST, PROFIT_LIST, CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT, CHANGE_LIST, SUPPLIER_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{year}, #{telephone}, #{auditors}, #{quota}, #{totalAssets}, #{totalLiabilities}, #{totalNetAssets}, #{taking}, #{auditOpinion}, #{liabilitiesList}, #{profitList}, #{cashFlowStatement}, #{changeList}, #{supplierId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_FINANCE
ID,
NAME,
YEAR,
TELEPHONE,
AUDITORS,
QUOTA,
TOTAL_ASSETS,
TOTAL_LIABILITIES,
TOTAL_NET_ASSETS,
TAKING,
AUDIT_OPINION,
LIABILITIES_LIST,
PROFIT_LIST,
CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT,
CHANGE_LIST,
SUPPLIER_ID,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
#{id},
#{name},
#{year},

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_FINANCE
NAME = #{name},
YEAR = #{year},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone},
AUDITORS = #{auditors},
QUOTA = #{quota},
TOTAL_ASSETS = #{totalAssets},
TOTAL_LIABILITIES = #{totalLiabilities},
TOTAL_NET_ASSETS = #{totalNetAssets},
TAKING = #{taking},
AUDIT_OPINION = #{auditOpinion},
LIABILITIES_LIST = #{liabilitiesList},
PROFIT_LIST = #{profitList},
CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT = #{cashFlowStatement},
CHANGE_LIST = #{changeList},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_FINANCE set NAME = #{name}, YEAR = #{year}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone}, AUDITORS = #{auditors}, QUOTA = #{quota}, TOTAL_ASSETS = #{totalAssets}, TOTAL_LIABILITIES = #{totalLiabilities}, TOTAL_NET_ASSETS = #{totalNetAssets}, TAKING = #{taking}, AUDIT_OPINION = #{auditOpinion}, LIABILITIES_LIST = #{liabilitiesList}, PROFIT_LIST = #{profitList}, CASH_FLOW_STATEMENT = #{cashFlowStatement}, CHANGE_LIST = #{changeList}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.ID as ID_, t2.NAME as FILE_NAME, t2.FILE_SIZE, t3.NAME as NAME_ from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_FINANCE t1 left join T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_ATTACHMENT t2 on t1.ID = t2.BUSINESS_ID left join T_SES_BMS_DICTIONARY_DATA t3 on t2.TYPE_ID = t3.ID where SUPPLIER_ID = #{SUPPLIER_ID}
